body: @RNDMuser Wasn't it obvious?......"Suicide" (That usually happens to some rape victims, for husband, of course that would have him go after her rapists, the side bitch bastard gets ruined, but the main bastard was the one he wanted to ruin as it was clear he was the mastermind the side bastard followed!)
@LordCellofEarth9 MC was detained for rape and robbery but how did the psychiatrist's wife died?
Holy shit this actually has a good story

@Reyas Ch2 has long been translated, so the obivious twist is the psychiatrist is the husband of the woman the MC raped (and the reason for his GB and brainwashing). Also note his "old partner" was given a letter about what happened to him with the psychiatrist and the cops coming to the rescue "in such a strange fashion!" (As though they were aware something was suppose to happen in that location!) It's clear the Guy set up the rape situation simply to solve it and look like a hero to the MC to gain her trust (even easier with the MC still being a piece of shit and planning on robbing him after being "cured"). Likely she looked enough like his wife that when he found out about her, he decided to do what the blind man in "Don't Breathe" did to the woman who ran his daughter down. "Force her to give him a new child the old fashion way!" (Except here he decides to brainwash her into replacing his dead wife! Even getting her to willingly dress and act similar to her! Just read CH2)

Using the Ludovico technique on top of making him a woman was quite a bit of overkill for his crimes. It's not like he could continue raping women as a woman  but anyway, the psychiatrist is extremely suspicious. I would be shocked if he's on the level, we'll see
this story seems quite familiar to me.... 🤔🤔🤔

@echantist Not really a spoiler, I did make a second comment to disregard the first one (Nhentai doesn't seem to have a delete comment option). I refuse to believe in time loops or any of that shit! Too "out there!" I like to think it's just coincidence that the MC's female form's face looks similar to the guy's dead wife (hell, who's to say he didn't have some hand in the transformation resulting in such!), he just made "adjustments" to assure the MC looked more and more like his wife while the "readjustments" to his thought patterns lean more to traits the crazy dude's wife had along with "advising" her in that direction (wanting sex with him of her own accord shows she's losing more and more of herself as she falls in love with him Remember her original plan was to use him then rob him! Now it's like she's forgotten that and fallen in love)

@LordCellofEarth92 
I don't care about that TBH. I can tell by even look it's a karma hentai in the "Same face MC Loop".

If he's got rape by the same MC it become temporal paradox of timeline but in terms of manga it's possible loop.
"your pussy is nice and tight, BRO!" LMFAO!!

Whoops, take back what I said abit because I forgot about the first two pages that show the guy!....LOL My bad. Of course after reading the story fully again....and paying full attention, I can't say I feel sorry for the MC like AT ALL! He was already trying to play the sympathy card with being punished with the GB & even planned to take advantage of the Psychiatrist if he helped her overcome the brainwashing by robbing him later......that's if she knew the guy hadn't targeted her already and had his own dark plans for her! On one hand, she'll be a cared for woman for the rest of her life...at the cost of his ego being completely replaced! (Man reminds me of that horror movie with the Blind Guy deciding the Woman who killed his daughter would be made to give him a new daughter...then tried to do the same to the female MC of that movie when she killed said pregnant woman in her attempt to escape him!)

@enchantist From what I heard on the comment section for this doujin in Ehentai. Someone brought up the theory that the psychiatrist ISN'T the raped woman at the start of the story's husband...."It's the raped woman HERSELF!" Seeing how easy they gender bended him (Hentai Logic), it's not a stretch that a woman can be GB in this universe just as easily (and it makes the revenge more interesting if that's true! What better way to get revenge on your rapist by making them as vulnerable and weak as you were then, not to mention completely dependent on you). Still a theory as the husband going for revenge makes more sense because this is Clockwork Orange with a GB Hentai twist, but it would be funny if it's true in CH3 if we get one.
